title: Bullion-n-BTC
author: Bullion-n-BTC
content: Looking for one of the Alpen Suisse gold plated bars. Will buy or trade silver or physical bitcoin for one. Will to do direct trade or use escrow. Thanks guys looking forward to hearing from somebody

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Hello, I have a bar in original case. Open to trading, let me know what you have and I’ll get pics.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: not to piggy back - but also looking for one - I found the 76 bar but the person who has it wants another one for trade, so I have to find one to buy first then I can trade for the 76 bar.

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: Spokanistan51 on May 08, 2022, 02:03:17 PMHello, I have a bar in original case. Open to trading, let me know what you have and I’ll get pics.Hey brother I’ll pm you with some trade offers. Can trade and include cash if you’d like

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I have #17/100.Would trade for vintage stuff like BTCC, CI’s.

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: I have a genesis 1oz silver bitcoin piece along with some other stuff I’d trade for one if anybody is interested

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: I have #62 and willing to sell at the closing auction price that ended this week in another thread. Steeley

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on May 11, 2022, 05:09:17 PMI have #62 and willing to sell at the closing auction price that ended this week in another thread. SteeleyLet me check the closing auction price out and I’ll pm you brother. Pm coming soon
